snippet: “I had been brought up to look forward to heaven then began to think of heaven as history, that I would lie old and forever in the arms of someone while they accounted my life.”
lead_paragraph: “I had been brought up to look forward to heaven then began to think of heaven as history, that I would lie old and forever in the arms of someone while they accounted my life.”

headline.seo: Excerpt — The Journals of Spalding Gray — Edited by Nell Casey
